description.value:
You gain a fly speed of 30 feet (average maneuverability). You can use this for “cruising flight” at a usage of only 1 charge per minute, but you are @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-footed} and @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.yUtkoIshf4dPruNd]{Off-Target} while doing so. Changing from normal flight to cruising flight or vice versa is a standard action. A jetpack can’t lift you if you’re @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.OwZA6flUQPH0jPA0]{Encumbered}.

This upgrade can be installed only in light or heavy armor.
